meanings.definition: A type of cheese originating from the Munster region of France.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious Munster sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The Munster cheese melted perfectly on the pizza.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Munster cheese refuse to be sliced? It was too cheesy!
meanings.sent4: The Munster cheese was a creamy delight in a sea of bland flavors.
meanings.sent5: The pungent aroma of Munster cheese filled the room, making mouths water.

meanings.sent1: My friend visited Munster and loved the scenic views.
meanings.sent2: The Munster province is known for its rich history.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tourist go to Munster? To explore the ancient castles!
meanings.sent4: In the heart of Munster, tradition and modernity blend seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The rolling hills of Munster beckoned travelers to discover its beauty.

meanings.sent1: The Munster cows produced high-quality milk.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in the region preferred Munster cattle for their dairy farms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Munster cow wear a bell? To be outstanding in the herd!
meanings.sent4: The Munster cattle stood strong and proud in the pasture.
meanings.sent5: The Munster cows grazed peacefully under the warm sun.
